title: StateConfiguration
description:

Started.title: Started
Started.description:

Specifies the exact time when the agent was activated and its session began.

LastAccess.title: Last Access
LastAccess.description:

Represents the most recent interaction time with the agent.


Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(state)-lastaccess-list

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(state)-threadid

LlmConnectorName.description:

**Summary**

Represents the name of the LLM (Large Language Model) connector associated with the agent.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(state)-llmconnectorname

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(state)-promptname

en, pl, etc.
